attributes.action: change the law to prevent parents, grandparents from witholding vital medical information which could affect a minor which in effect is child abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask the prime minister to pass a law making it abuse of a child to willfully and maliciously withold information of a medical nature from a childs gp which in effect should be child abuse but in actuallity it is not currently classed as such, even if it is a parent or grandparent doing so.  The human rights of the child should superseed any adults human rights to withold such information esspecially where they are at serious risk of developing conditions which if caught early can be treated.
